messages.messageBody:
on 1/27/04 2:48 PM, AM Brown at ambdkf@... wrote:

>
>>
>> Nancy (off to Equine Affaire tomorrow -- 4 days of Horse Conference <g>)
>
> Have fun, that sounds like fun! We are waiting for a PMU foal to arrive in
> a couple of weeks. We can't contain our excitement!
>
> I did enjoy the article and the site, thanks for posting it. Anna

Congratulations on your foal -- are you going to explain to the list what a
PMU foal is? ;-) (Of course, by the time you do, the curious will have
"googled" it!)

Nancy

messages.messageBody:
>
> Nancy (off to Equine Affaire tomorrow -- 4 days of Horse Conference <g>)

Have fun, that sounds like fun! We are waiting for a PMU foal to arrive in
a couple of weeks. We can't contain our excitement!

I did enjoy the article and the site, thanks for posting it. Anna
